meanings.definition: Done with great care and attention to detail.
meanings.sent1: She completed the puzzle painstakingly, making sure each piece fit perfectly.
meanings.sent2: The artist painted the portrait painstakingly, capturing every detail of the subject's face.
meanings.sent3: The chef painstakingly arranged the ingredients on the plate to look like a smiley face.
meanings.sent4: The detective examined the crime scene painstakingly, searching for any tiny clue that could solve the case.
meanings.sent5: The tailor sewed the dress painstakingly, ensuring every stitch was flawless.

meanings.definition: In a manner that involves a lot of effort and hard work.
meanings.sent1: She worked painstakingly to finish the project before the deadline.
meanings.sent2: The team climbed the mountain painstakingly, taking breaks to catch their breath.
meanings.sent3: The kids painstakingly cleaned their rooms, pretending to be secret agents on a mission.
meanings.sent4: The gardener tended to the plants painstakingly, as if each flower had a unique personality.
meanings.sent5: The athlete trained painstakingly, pushing themselves to the limit to improve their performance.
